bossDamage: monsterName inflicted bossDamage damage on bossName .
bossUsedOneHitKillSkill: bossName used a one-hit kill skill, "bossSkillName" .
monsterDamage: bossName inflicted monsterDamage damage on monsterName .
continueNote:
* You can register your score at the end of a battle.
* If your LP reaches 0, your score will be 0 and you will not be able to register.
* The attack power of monster and boss increases as the turns progress.
monsterOtherPhysicalAttack:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Charge" !
monsterName charged towards bossName!
monsterOtherSpecialAttack:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Shockwave" !
A shockwave occurred!
monsterOtherPowerPhysicalAttack:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Ultimate Flash" !
monsterName unleashed a tremendous blow with all its might!
monsterOtherPowerSpecialAttack:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Dragon God Summon" !
Suddenly, the ultimate dragon god appeared and unleashed a devastating flame!
monsterOtherDefense:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Bright Shield" !
A giant shining shield appeared in front of it!
monsterOtherHeal:
"skillName" has suddenly changed to "Blessing Light" !
monsterName's entire body was enveloped in a mysterious light!
bossBuffMiss: bossName was staggered by monsterName's attack and couldn't cast the buff skill!
bossDebuffMiss: bossName was staggered by monsterName's attack and couldn't cast the debuff skill!
invalidStarted: You should push "FIGHT" button to start the boss battle.
havingWeakFeature:
monsterName has a weakness feature, "weakFeature", against bossName!
monsterName's stats have increased!!!
defeated:
The LP of monsterName has reached 0!

Everything in front of me is becoming pitch black...
usedBossSubAction: It seems that bossName is about to make a move different from usual...
